title: Android Quick Share now works with Apple's AirDrop feature on Pixel 10 phones
description: Android and iPhone users can now beam each other files with much less hassle.
content: Count this as the latest unexpected detente between Apple and Google. Today, Google announced that the Pixel 10 series of phones can use Android Quick Share with the iPhone’s AirDrop feature, meaning it’ll be much easier to shoot files and photos bet... [1991 chars]
